Class ApiException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

        • java.lang.RuntimeException

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ApiException
extends HawaiiException
    Exception with a predefined error code.

    2.0.0
    Author:
    Paul Klos
